site_title: Ready For Takeoff by Didier Boursin

block_list.title: Video Tutorial
block_list.body: This is Paper plane 20 of our 100 Exotic Paper Airplane Challenge. Ready For Takeoff by Didier Boursin. This is an origami plane folded from a square sheet. If you missed my last Exotic Paper Airplane "Paper Plane 019 : Origami Delta by Gary J. Hinze", you could watch it at https://youtu.be/Gmjole56crs Thanks for watching! Wilson Lee @Heap Art
